page.title: 05Dairy Farm, Randalstown
page.content: There is a lot of money involved in a modern dairy farm,and Mr.McNeilly keeps careful records and accounts of all income and expenditure each year. A lot of the money he makes is channelled back into the farm in the form of new machinery and buildings. Recently three new sheds for use as cubical houses have been built on the farm. These are fully waterproof and are built of a wooden structure covered with corrugated iron. They range in size from 1800sq.feet to 2400sq.feet and cost around{Â£12,000 each, although{40%}of this was given as a government grant. Other old outhouses are made of stone and have whitewashed walls and red doors. The farmhouuse has recently been renovated, to make it a very modern and comfortable home in which to live.
